sect2.title: Installation of Kdepim
sect2.para: Install Kdepim by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
mkdir build && cd build &&
cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$KF5_PREFIX \ -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -DSYSCONF_INSTALL_DIR=$KF5_SYSCONFDIR \ -DLIB_INSTALL_DIR=lib \ -DKDEPIM_BUILD_MOBILE=OFF \ -DQT_PLUGIN_INSTALL_DIR=&qt5-plugins-dir; \ -Wno-dev .. && make

sect2.para: This package does not come with a test suite.

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: -DSYSCONF_INSTALL_DIR=$KF5_SYSCONFDIR: This switch is used to set correct XDG configuration directory.
-DKDEPIM_BUILD_MOBILE=OFF: This switch is used to prevent building of the mobile versions of Kdepim applications since they are not useful on a desktop.
